Description: Enhances the defense debuff potential of a power by {Boost.Attrib.DefenseDebuff.Scale}%, reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.  NOTE: This enhancement can only be slotted into defense debuff powers that require a To Hit check.
